TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_anu_sigang_samengmeng_han_henay_"saka_tinusa", title = anu_sigang_samengmeng_han_henay_"saka_tinusa", year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/anu_sigang_samengmeng_han_henay_"saka_tinusa"} }

S.FORM: kakiliman anu sigang samengmeng han henay "saka tinusa" nikiliman hicanita ku kawaw? pawanen ku gang, manapicici' manapi pahelak paising amana pi huwa liyaw. . anu malingatu tu utiih kuudip sa, kya mikilim tu sapaselep tu adada kapah tu. . anu mahini sa, kya lihalay apaledu tu nikaudip. . anu cay sakamu ku ising sa, manapipalita tuising, anu cimacima sa cayamin katineng tu hacica tu kunikaudip. . payawan u imelangay ugang haw u duma a imelang, ahican cay katalaising amukan tu sapaiyu'. . u imelangay mihica pakunida sat u ising a muhicahica, u ising nayay ku situdung a mutudu tu imwlanga ahican ku nipaising. . a minanm kuta tu baetu amukulikulin, u makulukuluday a baetu caay kasidamay . . kahina latlat tu udip, u punu' kahina dateng, u udip cay tu katayi . sisa saydahen ku nipawayway , tudedemiad idaw ku namuh linges lalum lipahak , u "limaay a nikaadih, tengil, sanek, nutiyung" cay tu kahaymaw. ( , , , , ) . Laliwnen ku cayay kalipahak a kawaw, kasaetim tu kaudip atu namuh. . mahida u musaungayay tu lima atu kukuk, misaungay ku kaway, atu tangah, sakapah hanku wayway atu nikasaungay. . kahinaculil, u idang muculil i udiudipan misaniyul, cay pahanhan i sasa nu udip, u culil nu idang matatungus tu. . ha ha tawa han , miedap milatlat tu heci nuudip atu mibaladay a laat, muhanhan mangaleb ku ni picumud ilabu a kapah tu, u udiudipan caluway sat u. . kahinakan tu asuay, kanamuh mikawaw tu kakakaydihan nu udip, kiyu hamaw sa manamuh, kya u udip muculil namin kuidang nu udip mabanaw tu nu tupan, nyhuday, pacakat tu namuh, anu mahini sa, nikaudip tanunamuh sat u. , , . nikaydaan sa numaku, anu kapah lipahak ku nikaudip, tawalen ku cacanan akakawaw, u gang cay kapiladlad i udip. . cay kasatedep sa wida kya u helak sananay a nikaudip, usakapahay a sapaekeng tu udiu ku mahiniay. , . ayda u gang mapatay iadaw ku mahiniay a kawaw, adihan mahida u kawaw nu taw, anu cila akay I udip nu mita. . udip nu udip wisu mu matinengay wisu ku mulimuuday ayda malingatu sakapahen ku nanam nikaudip, salihalay han maudip tu dedemiad, mahiniay sa sapipulu' tu gang sakapahay a nikaudip kuyni. datengen! u gang cayay kaw imelang u gang namakay nu udip anu pisakapah, caay kaw nipaising kuni pakapah. u tademaw nayay ku pili', widasa u laluk atu kasic kucayay kalecad. .
